sentences.english: I love to paint the light reflected off water when it ripples.
sentences.chinese: 我愛畫水面漾起漣漪時反射出的粼粼波光。

sentences.english: I can show you the world, shining, shimmering, splendid.
sentences.chinese: 我可以告訴你的世界，閃耀，波光粼粼，華麗。

sentences.english: The glistening light of waves is swimming on the sea top.
sentences.chinese: 俯望海面粼粼的波光曲線。

sentences.english: The sky was clear, and moonlight was shimmering on the lake.
sentences.chinese: 晴空萬里，湖上月光波光粼粼。

sentences.english: Moon water, glittering, slightly elongated shadow is the lake.
sentences.chinese: 望月水中，波光粼粼，微微月影被湖面拉長。

sentences.english: The sea, tranquil and smooth , was sparkling in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 海平靜安穩，在陽光下波光粼粼。

sentences.english: Lake Michigan shimmers in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 密歇根湖在陽光下波光粼粼。

sentences.english: During the day, the sun shines more under the surface of the lake floating light jump gold and sparkling.
sentences.chinese: 白天，陽光照耀下的湖面更是浮光躍金，波光粼粼。

sentences.english: The sea sparkled in the sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 陽光下，年夜海波光粼粼。

sentences.english: Under the moonlight sea, couple with ripples of the wave.
sentences.chinese: 月光下的大海，泛着粼粼的波。

sentences.english: With clear water and willow trees along the bank, it is the most popular tourist scenic spot with residents of Qingzhou.
sentences.chinese: 碧波粼粼，堤柳成蔭，是青州人喜愛的一處勝景。

sentences.english: Stardust beads have a softly shimmering surface.
sentences.chinese: 星塵珠輕輕地有波光粼粼的外面。

sentences.english: The white belt-like rivers were gleaming in the sunshine.
sentences.chinese: 白絲帶似的河流在陽光下波光粼粼。

definition: gleaming reflection of waves in sunlight
to ripple/to undulate/also written 蕩漾|荡漾
water and sky merge in one color (idiom)
bare and bald (of mountains)/bright and brilliant/fat and sleek
to sway gently (as in the wind)/(of a flame) to flicker
